DOC.brief_summary: Procure blood specimen individual present emergency department suspect brain injury .
DOC.brief_title: MIND ( Management Traumatic Brain Injury Diagnosis )
DOC.criteria: Informed Consent Form Signed 18 year age old For woman childbearing age : Not know pregnant AND Head Trauma within 6 hour ED presentation Glasgow Coma Scores 38 ( Severe Injury ) , 913 ( Moderate Injury ) , 1415 ( Mild Injury ) ; OR Head trauma within 6 hour ED presentation Glasgow Coma Score 15 ; OR Bone fracture polytraumas , head trauma Known preexist neurological condition cause observe symptom Recent history head injury seizure ( within 1 year current ED presentation ) Prisoner
